Title: Creates lien in favor of state for expenditures for certain remedial environmental projects
Summary: Entitles the state to a lien upon all real property of any person from whom the state may recover costs under the hazardous waste remedial fund or the environmental conservation law for certain expenditures made by the state.
LawCode: Add ยง27-1325, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to liens against expenditures
